ThreadCallback1< T, P1 > Class Template Reference

A version of Callback1 but encapsulated into a thread which automatically performs the callback on its Entry function. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename P1>
class ThreadCallback1< T, P1 >

A version of Callback1 but encapsulated into a thread which automatically performs the callback on its Entry function.

See also:
Callback1

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T , typename P1 >
ThreadCallback1< T, P1 >::ThreadCallback1 ( T &  obj,
void(T::*)(P1 &)  func,
P1 &  p1 
) [inline]

Creates a new callback for object obj calling function func with data p1 when the thread starts.

Parameters:
obj the object to perform the callback on
func the function name to call when the thread starts
p1 extra data to pass to the callback

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T , typename P1 >
void* ThreadCallback1< T, P1 >::Entry (  )  [inline]

The thread entry function.

This calls the function callback immediately.
